ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED( ProfileId), $Profile.Name != 'System Administrator', text($User.SF_IT_Team_Category__c) != 'L2 Team', NOT( $Permission.Validation_Rule_Exemption), NOT(CONTAINS(TEXT(UserType),"Partner")) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot edit the Profile on a User, please submit a GTMS Admin ticket to make these changes within production.
